Title: Relates to creating the Puerto Rican relief account
Summary: Relates to creating the Puerto Rican relief account which shall consist of all recovery and relief funds provided by the federal government to the Commonwealth of Puerto Rico under the Bipartisan Budget Act of 2018.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the state finance law, in relation to creating the Puerto Rican relief account; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
